author: Mia Jankowicz
title: Italy's number of active coronavirus cases has fallen for the first time, 2 months after its devastating outbreak began
description:
• The head of Italy's civil protection service announced that the number of active coronavirus cases in Italy fell on Monday, for the first time since the outbreak began there, according to AFP.
  • The drop — of just 20 people — is nonetheless a …
content:
The number of active coronavirus cases in Italy fell for the first time on Monday, two months after the country's battle against the virus began.
Angelo Borelli, head of the country's civil protection service, told reporters that there were 108,237 active ca… [+1776 chars]
